Articles.Content:
I need somebody to join me in a space race. I create a rocket or something and do something with it. Then I send the save file to my opponent and he douse the same.

The objective nothing just have fun.

The rules:

1.Only one vehicle can be created at a time.

2. No purposely destroying an opponents craft.

3. You can look at an opponents vehicle, but can not touch.

4. You can only interact with vehicles that have the neutral tag in the name(meaning you cant dock with a space station that isn't yours and doesn't have the neutral tag on it).

5. Whenever you dock with something you must wait till your next turn to undock(only applicable to resupplying).

7.Your vehicle must have your initials in the name.

8. Must be running the same mods.

The mods I am running are.

1.Kethane

2.KAS

3.IonHybridElectricPack

4.OrbitalConstruction Redux

5.Mechjeb

Tell me if your interested!

I'm up for a space race!

My Skype is aidan.moore712
